column4: wtf... i try to add multiverse to my sources, and everytime i check it in the synaptic repo's add, it just goes away after i hit okay
someone know how i can fix that?
i need multiverse to work so i can watching dvd's... but it apparently hates me
you know the line for multiverse?
the same as all the other lines
most should already be in there, just commented out
synaptic must have removed it then
wouldn't want to copy me your's by chance would you?  since synaptic is being a bitch and whatnot
can't, ubuntu is on my laptop which is at home
actually, i installed from cdrom and the sources.list had both
tried using multiverse... you told me i needed marillat
my bad... you're right.  i apologize.
hope you don't take me as too big of a dick for that
